# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $200 by us, reflecting its high-quality craftsmanship and unique features. Considering its worth and the benefits it provides, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $180. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-tier product. Let me know if you have any questions or would like to proceed with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
